scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.fix:check: npm run fix:all && npx tsc --noEmit -p apps/vumi-gigs/tsconfig.json
scripts.fix:complete: npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run fix:props && npm run fix:syntax && npm run fix:function-syntax && npm run fix:imports && npm run fix:icons && npm run fix:homepage && npm run fix:pages && npm run build:skipcheck
scripts.fix:all-types: npm run fix:enhanced && npm run fix:db && npm run fix:ui && cd apps/vumi-gigs && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.build:skipcheck: cd apps/vumi-gigs && npx tsc --skipLibCheck && vite build
scripts.build:skip: cd apps/vumi-gigs && npx tsc --skipLibCheck && vite build
scripts.fix:all-errors: npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run build:skip
scripts.fix:final:all: npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run fix:props && npm run build:skipcheck
scripts.fix:everything: npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run fix:props && npm run fix:syntax && npm run build:skipcheck
scripts.fix:complete-all: npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run fix:props && npm run fix:syntax && npm run fix:function-syntax && npm run build:skipcheck
scripts.fix:super-all: npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run fix:props && npm run fix:syntax && npm run fix:function-syntax && npm run fix:imports && npm run build:skipcheck
scripts.fix:complete-build: npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run fix:props && npm run fix:syntax && npm run fix:function-syntax && npm run fix:imports && npm run fix:icons && npm run build:skipcheck
scripts.fix:all-final: npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run fix:props && npm run fix:syntax && npm run fix:function-syntax && npm run fix:imports && npm run fix:icons && npm run fix:homepage && npm run build:skipcheck
scripts.fix:all-remaining: npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run fix:props && npm run fix:syntax && npm run fix:function-syntax && npm run fix:imports && npm run fix:icons && npm run fix:homepage && npm run fix:pages && npm run fix:dups && npm run fix:creator-direct && npm run fix:dups-colorMode && npm run fix:creator-dups && npm run fix:creator-semicolons && npm run build:skipcheck
scripts.fix:creator: node scripts/fix-creator-listing.js
scripts.fix:all-issues: npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run fix:props && npm run fix:syntax && npm run fix:function-syntax && npm run fix:imports && npm run fix:icons && npm run fix:homepage && npm run fix:pages && npm run fix:dups && npm run fix:creator && npm run build:skipcheck
scripts.inspect:creator: node scripts/inspect-file.js
scripts.fix:ultimate: npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run fix:props && npm run fix:syntax && npm run fix:function-syntax && npm run fix:imports && npm run fix:icons && npm run fix:homepage && npm run fix:pages && npm run fix:dups && npm run fix:creator-direct && npm run build:skipcheck
scripts.fix:all-final-build: npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run fix:props && npm run fix:syntax && npm run fix:function-syntax && npm run fix:imports && npm run fix:icons && npm run fix:homepage && npm run fix:pages && npm run fix:dups && npm run fix:creator-direct && npm run fix:dups-colorMode && npm run fix:creator-dups && npm run build:skipcheck
scripts.fix:master: npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run fix:props && npm run fix:syntax && npm run fix:function-syntax && npm run fix:imports && npm run fix:icons && npm run fix:homepage && npm run fix:pages && npm run fix:dups && npm run fix:creator-direct && npm run fix:dups-colorMode && npm run fix:syntax-errors && npm run build:skipcheck
scripts.fix:ultimate-complete: npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run fix:props && npm run fix:syntax && npm run fix:function-syntax && npm run fix:imports && npm run fix:icons && npm run fix:homepage && npm run fix:pages && npm run fix:dups && npm run fix:creator-direct && npm run fix:dups-colorMode && npm run fix:syntax-errors && npm run fix:studios && npm run build:skipcheck
scripts.fix:ultimate-build: npm run fix:deps && npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run fix:props && npm run fix:syntax && npm run fix:function-syntax && npm run fix:imports && npm run fix:icons && npm run fix:homepage && npm run fix:pages && npm run fix:dups && npm run fix:creator-direct && npm run fix:dups-colorMode && npm run fix:syntax-errors && npm run fix:studios && npm run build:skipcheck
scripts.setup: npm run cleanup && npm install && npm run fix:ultimate-build
scripts.fix:master-build: npm run fix:deps && npm run fix:router && npm run fix:types && npm run fix:comma && npm run fix:props && npm run fix:syntax && npm run fix:function-syntax && npm run fix:imports && npm run fix:icons && npm run fix:homepage && npm run fix:pages && npm run fix:dups && npm run fix:creator-direct && npm run fix:dups-colorMode && npm run fix:syntax-errors && npm run fix:studios && npm run build:skipcheck
